resourceTemplates.name: cartesia-list-voices
resourceTemplates.title: Cartesia - List Voices
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieves a paginated list of Cartesia voices. Supports cursor-based pagination (starting_after, ending_before), search (q), filtering by ownership (is_owner) and gender (masculine, feminine, gender_neutral), and optional expansion of additional fields such as preview_file_url. Requires Authorization header (Bearer API key or access token) and mandatory Cartesia-Version header (e.g. 2025-04-16).
